abstract: Comcast said it would buy DailyCandy, a publisher of net newsletters, for $125 million.
snippet: Comcast said it would buy DailyCandy, a publisher of net newsletters, for $125 million.
lead_paragraph: DailyCandy started in 2000 as an e-mail publisher for a relatively small group: young women in New York who were interested in the latest in shopping and culture, and had money to spend.

headline.main: Comcast Buying a Publisher of Net Newsletters and Sites
headline.print_headline: Comcast Buying a Publisher Of Net Newsletters and Sites

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
